channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Left’s Hypocrisy Problem with Energy and Affordability
item.description: Democrats talk a big game on bringing down costs, but in reality, their energy approach raises the price of everything.

item.title: New Year’s Wants, with a Nod to William Blake
item.description: Hoping for the best at two biennial shows, and will your art critic get to the new Grand Egyptian Museum?

item.title: Who Is the Radical?
item.description: Muslim jihadists’ actions are consistent with centuries-old sharia law.

item.title: Kash Patel says FBI leaving Hoover Building, staying in D.C.
item.description: FBI Director Kash Patel said the J. Edgar Hoover Building in Washington is closing, with the bureau moving to another D.C. site.

item.title: 50 Years After the Edmund Fitzgerald, It’s Time to Fix American Shipbuilding
item.description: More U.S.-built cargo ships would help revitalize the country’s industrial landscape.

item.title: New York Legalizes Doctors Prescribing Death
item.description: New York Gov. Hochul announced last week that she will sign a bill legalizing medically assisted suicide for adults with a terminal illness.

item.title: Trump Targets the Islamic State in Nigeria
item.description: The U.S. launched Tomahawk cruise missiles at two Islamic State bases, and the administration is claiming the deaths of multiple terrorists.

item.title: Ladies, You’re Loading The Dishwasher All Wrong. Here’s How To Do It The Right Way
item.description: The Federalist is here with a step-by-step guide on how to properly load a dishwasher and end your kitchen nightmares once and for all.

item.title: Artificial Intelligence In The Classroom Destroys Actual Intelligence In Students
item.description: Students should aspire to be more than mere 'prompt writers,' but minds capable of thinking, reasoning, and perseverance.
